long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the voice of YouTube with the Random YouTube Comment Picker! This Chrome extension allows you to pick a random comment from any YouTube video, giving you a fresh perspective on the conversations happening in the YouTube community.

Features:

Easy to Use: Just enter the URL of a YouTube video, and hit the "Fetch Comment" button to get a random comment.
Dynamic: If you want a different comment, just click the button again for a new random comment from the same video.
Informative: Along with the comment, you also get to see the user's name, channel ID, and profile picture.
Use Cases:

Get a quick snapshot of public sentiment on a video.
Enjoy a random sampling of the diverse perspectives found in YouTube comments.
Add a bit of fun and randomness to your YouTube browsing experience!

Maybe you want to offer a gift card, it's simple now to select the random person.
